library(r3PGmix)

## Example

```{r}
out <- run_3PG(
  siteInputs = site_eum,
  speciesInputs = species_eum,
  forcingInputs = climate_eum,
  parameterInputs = parameters_eum[,-1],
  biasInputs = bias_eum[,-1]
)


out[,,1,1]

```
